1 var DATA_TYPES = require('../constants/DataTypes'),
  2   Helpers = require('../utils/Helpers'),
  3   ErrorMessages = require('../constants/ErrorMessages'),
  4   CAS = require('../constants/CASConstants');
  5 
  6 module.exports = FetchPacket;
  7 
  8 /**
  9  * Constructor
 10  * @param options
 11  * @constructor
 12  */
 13 function FetchPacket(options) {
 14   options = options || {};
 15 
 16   this.casInfo = options.casInfo;
 17   this.dbVersion = options.dbVersion;
 18 
 19   this.responseCode = 0;
 20   this.errorCode = 0;
 21   this.errorMsg = '';
 22 }
 23 
 24 /**
 25  * Write data
 26  * @param writer
 27  * @param queryPacket
 28  */
 29 FetchPacket.prototype.write = function (writer, queryPacket) {
 30   var bufferLength = DATA_TYPES.DATA_LENGTH_SIZEOF + DATA_TYPES.CAS_INFO_SIZE +
 31     DATA_TYPES.BYTE_SIZEOF + DATA_TYPES.INT_SIZEOF + DATA_TYPES.INT_SIZEOF +
 32     DATA_TYPES.INT_SIZEOF + DATA_TYPES.INT_SIZEOF + DATA_TYPES.INT_SIZEOF + DATA_TYPES.INT_SIZEOF +
 33     DATA_TYPES.INT_SIZEOF + DATA_TYPES.BYTE_SIZEOF + DATA_TYPES.INT_SIZEOF + DATA_TYPES.INT_SIZEOF;
 34 
 35   writer._writeInt(bufferLength - DATA_TYPES.DATA_LENGTH_SIZEOF - DATA_TYPES.CAS_INFO_SIZE);
 36   writer._writeBytes(DATA_TYPES.CAS_INFO_SIZE, this.casInfo);
 37 
 38   writer._writeByte(CAS.CASFunctionCode.CAS_FC_FETCH);
 39   writer._writeInt(DATA_TYPES.INT_SIZEOF);
 40   writer._writeInt(queryPacket.queryHandle); //serverHandler
 41   writer._writeInt(DATA_TYPES.INT_SIZEOF);
 42   writer._writeInt(queryPacket.currentTupleCount + 1); //Start position (= current cursor position + 1)
 43   writer._writeInt(DATA_TYPES.INT_SIZEOF);
 44   writer._writeInt(100); //Fetch size; 0 = default; recommended = 100
 45   writer._writeInt(DATA_TYPES.BYTE_SIZEOF);
 46   writer._writeByte(0); //Is case sensitive
 47   writer._writeInt(DATA_TYPES.INT_SIZEOF);
 48   writer._writeInt(0); //Is the ResultSet index...?
 49 
 50   return writer;
 51 };
 52 
 53 /**
 54  * Read data
 55  * @param parser
 56  * @param queryPacket
 57  */
 58 FetchPacket.prototype.parse = function (parser, queryPacket) {
 59   var responseLength = parser._parseInt();
 60   this.casInfo = parser._parseBytes(DATA_TYPES.CAS_INFO_SIZE);
 61 
 62   this.responseCode = parser._parseInt();
 63   if (this.responseCode !== 0) {
 64     this.errorCode = parser._parseInt();
 65     this.errorMsg = parser._parseNullTerminatedString(responseLength - 2 * DATA_TYPES.INT_SIZEOF);
 66     if (this.errorMsg.length === 0) {
 67       this.errorMsg = Helpers._resolveErrorCode(this.errorCode);
 68     }
 69   } else {
 70     this.tupleCount = parser._parseInt();
 71     return JSON.stringify({ColumnValues : queryPacket._getData(parser, this.tupleCount)});
 72   }
 73 };
 74 
 75 
 76
